achievements: Key figure in the women's suffrage movement
Co-author of the Declaration of Sentiments
Advocate for women's rights in education, property, and employment
United States Secretary of War during the American Civil War
Close advisor to President Abraham Lincoln
Played a key role in prosecuting the war against the Confederacy
President of Columbia Broadcasting System (CBS) from 1946 to 1971
Oversaw the expansion of CBS into television and other media
Played a key role in the development of broadcasting standards
